HDInsightClusterLoginPassword.value: SECUREPASSWORD -- Used to login to HDInsights cluster interface. The password must be at least 10 characters in length and must contain at least one digit, one non-alphanumeric character, and one upper or lower case letter.

HDInsightSshPassword.value: SECUREPASSWORD -- Used to login to HDInsight cluster nodes via SSH. The password must be at least 10 characters in length and must contain at least one digit, one non-alphanumeric character, and one upper or lower case letter.
